headline: GE Vernova’s Q4 Was Strong—But the Backlog Number Matters More
summary: GE Vernova is off to a hot start in 2026, with its latest earnings report pushing shares higher. Strong orders and cash flow guidance support its outlook.

headline: Jim Cramer GE Vernova Has “Visibility on the Earnings to the 2030s”
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer shared takes on, along with navigating market shortages. Cramer highlighted the company’s long-term prospects, as he said: We’re a nation short on power, too. For years, our electricity barely grew, so power generation became a tough business, bad business. Biggest company, General Electric, […]

headline: 5 Stocks To Watch Trade Near Buy Points; Three Are Data Center Plays
summary: GE Vernova broke out past a buy point Friday, while Vertiv Holdings, Dycom Industries, Halozyme Therapeutics and Viking Holdings are other stocks to watch as they trade near buy points.  Of the five stocks, three are benefiting from data center expansion.  While GE Vernova released Q4 earnings the past week, other stocks to watch are still weeks away from reporting.
